title: Murder at the Masquerade Ball

victim.name: Evelyn Thompson
victim.description: Evelyn was wearing a black and gold mask and a long red dress.

crimeScene: The masquerade ball was held at a luxurious hotel ballroom. Evelyn was found dead in the bathroom, slumped on the floor next to the sink. There were no signs of struggle or forced entry.

suspects.name: Robert Lee
suspects.description: Robert was wearing a black and silver mask and a dark suit. He had a noticeable scar above his left eyebrow.
suspects.alibi: He claims he was dancing with his wife all night.
suspects.story: Robert and Evelyn used to work together at a publishing company. According to Robert, Evelyn had an affair with his boss, which led to his dismissal from the company. Robert had been holding a grudge against Evelyn ever since, and he saw the ball as the perfect opportunity to exact his revenge.

suspects.name: Chloe Williams
suspects.description: Chloe was wearing a blue and white mask and a pink dress. She had a small butterfly tattoo on her left wrist.
suspects.alibi: She claims she was in the ladies' room next door.
suspects.story: Chloe was jealous of Evelyn's success. She had been trying to get a job at the publishing company where Evelyn worked, but Evelyn always got the better assignments. Chloe decided to take matters into her own hands and kill Evelyn at the ball.

suspects.name: Jack Thompson
suspects.description: Jack was wearing a green and gold mask and a black suit. He had a small scar on his chin.
suspects.alibi: He claims he was with his wife at the time of the murder.
suspects.story: Jack is Evelyn's husband. He found out about Evelyn's affair with his boss a few months ago, and they had been fighting ever since. Jack had threatened to kill Evelyn if she ever cheated on him again.

suspects.name: Sophia Kim
suspects.description: Sophia was wearing a purple and gold mask and a white dress. She had a diamond necklace around her neck.
suspects.alibi: She claims she was dancing with her boyfriend all night.
suspects.story: Sophia is Evelyn's best friend. She knew about Evelyn's affair with Jack's boss and had tried to convince her to end it. Sophia was worried that Jack would find out and do something drastic, so she kept a close eye on him throughout the night.

clearCondition.name: Jack Thompson
clearCondition.how: Jack put poison in Evelyn's drink when she wasn't looking.
clearCondition.why: Jack was angry about Evelyn's affair and wanted to get revenge.

prologue: You are a detective tasked with solving the murder of Evelyn Thompson, a successful publisher who was found dead at a masquerade ball. The suspects are all attendees of the ball, and each has a motive to kill Evelyn. Can you use your detective skills to find the real murderer and bring them to justice?
